sentences.en: A sound approach to the problem is to minimize the number of parts.
sentences.cn: 正确解决这一问题的方法是把零件的数目减至最少.

sentences.en: At his trial, he tried to minimize his behavior.
sentences.cn: 接受审判的时候，他企图对自己的行为轻描淡写。

sentences.en: At present most methods employ digital computations and certain correction techniques that minimize instrumental errors.
sentences.cn: 目前大多数方法是采用电子计算机,同时配合一定的校正技术,以减少仪器误差.

sentences.en: Click on the top of the window to minimize it.
sentences.cn: 点击窗口的顶端使其最小化。

sentences.en: Click the square icon again to minimize the window.
sentences.cn: 再次点击正方形图标，把窗口最小化。

sentences.en: Concerned people want to minimize the risk of developing cancer.
sentences.cn: 忧心忡忡的人们想把患上癌症的风险降到最低。

sentences.en: Do not minimize the risk involved.
Every effort is being made to minimize civilian casualties.
sentences.cn: 正在尽最大努力减少平民伤亡。

sentences.en: Good hygiene helps to minimize the risk of infection.
sentences.cn: 保持清洁有助于最大限度地减少感染的危险。

sentences.en: I have no wish to minimize his role or his achievement.
sentences.cn: 我不想低估他的作用,也不想贬低他的成就.

sentences.en: Measures which minimize systemic uptake reduce toxicity.
sentences.cn: 凡是足以减少周身吸收的方法,都能减少毒性反应.

sentences.en: Several steps and strategies have been developed to minimize these risks.
sentences.cn: 有关人士发展了若干措施和方法以减少这些风险.

sentences.en: The administrative decisionmaking process should also attempt to minimize the risk of wrong decisions.
sentences.cn: 行政决策程序还应当努力降低错判的风险.

sentences.en: The rail company is bringing in more trains in an effort to minimize disruption to travellers.
sentences.cn: 铁路公司正投入更多的列车来减少旅客的不便。

sentences.en: To minimize collateral damage maximum precision in bombing was required.
sentences.cn: 为了尽量减低附带性破坏，轰炸须做到最大程度的精确。

sentences.en: To minimize computer requirements, system frequency response is often compromised.
sentences.cn: 为了尽量减少计算机的工作量, 需要分析系统的频率响应特性.

sentences.en: To minimize the risk of burglary, install a good alarm system.
sentences.cn: 安装可靠的报警设备以减低被盗的风险.

sentences.en: To minimize this cost, authority should be decentralized wherever feasible.
sentences.cn: 为了减少这方面的损失, 可把职权作适当的分散.

sentences.en: You can minimize the dangers of driving by taking care to obey the rules of the road.
sentences.cn: 严格遵守交通规则，你就能把行车危险降到最低点。

trans.tran_en: to make a document or program on your computer very small when you are not using it but still want to keep it open
If you minimize a risk, problem, or unpleasant situation, you reduce it to the lowest possible level, or prevent it from increasing beyond that level

trans.tran_cn: 把…减至最低数量[程度]，对（某事物）作最低估计，极力贬低（某事物）的价值[重要性]，极度轻视
